page.title: 10THE METHODIST ANNIVERSARY
page.content: At the {Methodist Anniversary }the children who go to Sunday School at the Centenary Methodist Chapel sing songs and say pieces (recitations).In this Sunday School at{Kirkby Stephen} there are about fifteen children. The Anniversary is held in May and we all get dressed up in our best clothes.The pieces are mostly like this. {Sacrifice { Sacrifice seems a hard word { For us to understand { But yet we know its meaning { So noble and so grand.} We have two services one in the afternoon with all the scholars and the other in the evening with just the older scholars. The teachers are Miss Harper, Mrs Robinson and Anne-Marie Capstick.They all have a class of their own and Avril Walker helps them.
